column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////When  my friend suggested tapas at a place called ba-ba-reeba.... I thought
column2: um... but this place didn't disappoint.  We got off to a strange start - we waited for our table for about 30 minutes
column3: and then when they called my name
column4: we walked up and told us that our party had already been seated.  Basically the hostess thinking I was lying about having a reservation.  Apparently
column5: some wench stole our table.  Luckily
column6: it was resolved right away and they sat us at another table.
